phrases: It is finally time to start school...
The first day is so exciting, is not it?
You seem more nervous than excited, Hina-chan.
I wonder if I will make friends,
and if I will be able to get along with my classmates...
Thinking about it all makes me so nervous.
You are going to be standing on the stage with the theater troupe soon.
Think of this as another type of training.
For starters, if I can get over freezing up whenever I am in front of people...
You are talking to us right now, are not you?
I am starting to feel like I can do this!
N-No, that was a very unique self-introduction.
I can call you that, right?
So you lived in the country?
I lived in the mountains and worked as a scarecrow!
That is a funny way to communicate!
So what did you do as a scarecrow?
Well, you see, all the fans of Chiaki-chan, the theater club ace,
put this together over spring break!
You know, since the club went on hiatus,
we do not get to see you on stage, right?
That makes your fans really sad.
And you seemed really disappointed when it went on hiatus, too.
So we thought, if we started a theater society, you could act again!
That ventriloquism talk went over better than I thought.
I was not able to say a word, though.
Well, there is something I wanted to show you.
Miss Landlady, what is this about a society?
My friends put it together to replace the theater club while it is on hiatus.
So that means we will be able to do theater here at this school?
What do you two want to do?
Okay, could you come to the theater club room later?
It is just a society now, but you will still need to apply.
You were talking to her like you are!
What is going on between you?
Um, I am sorry, but who might you be?
I am your classmate, Nakajima Yua!
I want to be an actress, and I enrolled in this school because of Chiaki-senpai's acting!
How can a little shrimp like you be friends with Chiaki-senpai?
I might have gone too far!
I guess she is a nice person deep down...
But I still want to know what the deal is!
I do not get her at all.
Hina-chan and I have somewhere we need to go,
so we will be going now.
We ran into someone pretty powerful.
I need to talk to you!
Are you really planning to join the club?
I will never approve of you joining!
A failure of a little shrimp like you...
Jeez, that is hard to say.
A failshrimp like you is not fit to be in this theater club with Chiaki-senpai!
In fact, you are not fit for Chiaki-senpai!
Do you even have the guts to stand on a stage?
So, um, are you hoping to join the club?
Let us do our best together.
Well, I will be going now!
Did I do something to her?
At any rate, you saved Hina-chan.
You make such delicious coffee, Mayu-chan.
By the way, I heard you two joined the theater club?
It is just a society now, though.
But it is the theater club at its core, right?
All the club members are joining, too.
In any case, Hina-chan's goal of being in theater at Fujimiya High has come true.
But we have only just formed our theater troupe.
Was it okay for us to join the theater club?
Why do not you just do both?
Sounds like you will be busy.
There is another hurdle Hina-chan needs to get over first, after all.
I mean getting used to being in front of people!
Then how about working part-time in the coffee shop?
It is a service industry, after all.
Hina-chan, try working here on your next day off from school.
I let Mayu-chan talk me into agreeing, but...
Theater troupe, theater club, serving customers part-time...
How am I going to do this?!
But as long as I do not get nervous, things seem to work out okay...
I guess all I can do is try my best.
I may be mistaken, but that is what I think.
At any rate, the bear's gall of Nametoko Mountain is well-known.
I-It cures s-stomachaches and m-makes wounds disappear.
I will read it for her.
It cures stomachaches and makes wounds disappear.
a sign has long stood that reads,'Bear's gall here.'
Is not she... that scary girl?
Can you help me carry the handouts on the desk here?
I will do it for her!
I will do it for her!
What should we eat on the way home today?
We are having dinner as soon as we get home.
Eating books to hold myself over is kind of...
The desserts there are the best!
I would like one of these and one of these.
Excuse me, but which way is the station?
I will show you the way!
You need to get to the station, right?
Just turn left at that traffic signal there,
then go straight, and you will see it right away.
You have been such a big help.
This will show everyone that I can do what that little failure cannot!
Do you see what a failshrimp you are now?
The one fit for Chiaki-senpai is me, Nakajima Yu
Did I take that too far?
Do not think that way, Yua!
She always covers for me when I fall short.
Actually putting on that uniform might be kind of embarrassing...
Could I work at the used bookstore, maybe?
So that is why she is been nodding off all morning.
I will support you all the way!
Th-Then... I will be counting on you.
M-Mayu-chan, is this really a uniform?
Hina-chan, let us move right on to the next one!
I think I am still dreaming.
I guess clean and pure really is best.
Well, ready to get started now?
I have never done any work other than being a scarecrow...
Oh, Mayu-chan, do you have any tips for serving customers?
There is greeting them properly, speaking loudly,
and everything else can be solved with a smile.
We hardly get any customers, anyway...
but what if we do get customers?
Just thinking about serving customers makes me nervous...
She is got her hopes up...
What brings you here by yourself?
I got lost and cannot find my way home.
Do you know your home phone number?
Then call your family with this.
I am sure they will come for you, tweet.
I feel a little guilty somehow...
I am at a place called Coffee Shop Hitotose.
I am with a girl in a really fancy costume!
Um, she seems to be lost.
Oh, but we have already called her mom,
and she is coming for her.
You were able to talk to her, right?
Oh, I did not do anything.
I was not able to talk to a single customer the whole time.
I will completely fail both the theater troupe and the theater club at this rate.
I will try my hardest to talk to that girl!
I cannot move forward if I keep talking about failing.
Time to take a step forward!
I thought you would be bawling after learning that I am the one fit for Chiaki-senpai,
and maybe you would not come to school anymore.
Actually, I was wondering what I would do if you did not come.
You realize that you are a failshrimp, right?
After all those times I covered for you!
Thanks for helping me out so much.
So, there is actually something I have been wanting to say to you...
A-Are you sure you are not mistaken?
I was not trying to help you or...
That was a conditioned reflex, or something...
I think we will be really good friends!
Can I call you Yua-chan from now on?
I am so glad Hina-chan seems to have made a friend!
And the theater society's activities have begun, too.
It sounds like Hina-chan is practicing lots of things every day.
